content:
Sure, here are some recommended programs or segments to watch out for on Al Jazeera and CNN International:

Al Jazeera:

1. Talk to Al Jazeera: This is a long-form interview program that features politicians, activists, and other newsmakers from around the world. 2. Inside Story: This is a roundtable discussion program that takes a closer look at global news stories and issues. 3. Counting the Cost: This is a business and economics program that examines the global financial landscape. 4. Witness: This is a documentary program that features human-interest stories from around the world. CNN International:

1. Amanpour: This is a long-form interview program hosted by Christiane Amanpour, which features world leaders, journalists, and other newsmakers. 2. CNN Freedom Project: This is a multimedia initiative that focuses on modern-day slavery and human trafficking around the world. 3. Fareed Zakaria GPS: This is a current affairs program that features in-depth analysis of global news stories. 4. Connect the World: This is a news program that provides an overview of the day’s global headlines. I hope this helps you to find some interesting programs and segments!
